description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. WAR, it's Tank-tastic! Try to survive the single player campaign. Play the multiplayer modes Deathmatch, Last tank standing, Capture the flag and Pass the bomb. 1-4 players can go free for all or team up in any crazy uneven sized teams. Strategic and chaotic items twist and turns the gameplay for better or worse. Over and Out.
